name: Carmocrat
tag_list: ecommcerce, posters, posters-india, posters-online-india, merchandise, licensed-merchadise
overview:
Carmocrat started off as a concept, through which we wanted to provide everyone, the ability to showcase their identity and personality on the walls of their homes. It is an online retail startup offering posters, art prints and merchandise that allow consumers to express their individuality. Carmocrat is a concept, through which everyone will have the ability to showcase their identity and personality on the walls of their homes. It is a dynamic concept wherein customers can try to change the look and feel, in a word – the ‘ environment’ of their room. It is a responsible company; all the posters and merchandise offered are 100% licensed and copyrighted. They take great pride in offering products of the highest quality and operating within the legal framework.

Come lets “Cover The Walls With Your Identity!”
